RACE.RACE_TEXT: Lonesome Glory H. - Grade1 BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 2 1/2M Hurdle CR: N/A. Stakes Purse 150000. TO BE RUN OVER NATIONAL FENCES A HURDLE HANDICAP FOR FOUR-YEAR-OLDS AND UPWARD. HURDLE STAKES. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. Weights to be published on Wednesday, September 6, 2023. Closed S aturday, September 2, 2023 with 8 Nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MERRY MAKER (IRE) was off at the rear of the field, saved ground at the back, moved out after turn four, jumped outward at fences nine and ten, was urged four wide on the final turn, rallied seven wide into the stretch, closed strongly on the far outside and got up to prevail. L'IMPERATOR (FR) was well placed just off the pace on the inside while jumping well, moved out into the stretch, took the lead around the three-sixteenths, drifted out under threat late and was caught while clear for the place. BARBADOS (IRE) settled towards the back, struggled over fence ten then stumbled and safely secured the show while no threat to the top two. SNAP DECISION went to the front, showed the way while jumping well, was asked on the final turn, lost the advantage in upper stretch and weakened. CITY DREAMER (IRE) jumped well while near the middle of the field, was urged before fence nine and lacked the needed response. PROVEN INNOCENT settled towards the outside, moved closer after the fourth turn, struggled over fence nine and failed to respond. RESTITUTION (FR) tracked the pace on the outside, jumped poorly at fences six and eight then faltered and was eased but walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Snap Decision
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed way,jumped well,headed upper stretch,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Barbados (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: Colton, Jr., Richard C. and Thayer, Stella
ENTRY.COMMENT: towards back,struggled fence 10,stumbled,safely secured show

ENTRY.NAME: Merry Maker (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: off at rear,setld ins,mvd out before9,jump out9,10,4w,7w1/4,rally

ENTRY.NAME: Proven Innocent
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,outside,closer before 9,struggled over 9,no response

ENTRY.NAME: City Dreamer (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: jumped well,mid-pack,lacked needed response

ENTRY.NAME: Restitution (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside,jumped poorly fence 6,8,faltered,eased,wlkd off

ENTRY.NAME: L'Imperator (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside,mvd out 1/4,led upper stretch,drift out,caught

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 88. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLACK RAIN coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside through the turn and was patiently handled until set down spinning three to four wide into upper stretch when under challenge to the outside, dug in head to head clinging to command a furlong out while widening away from the rest as a pair, repelled the challenge and gamely inched away in the late stages to prevail. QUALITY CHIC chased just off the inside until tucked inside at the five-eighths, angled out four to five wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid a at the head of the stretch, dug in head to head through to the sixteenth marker fighting on but was ultimately rebuffed inside that station while well clear of the rest and along second best. CLOUD FOREST grew detached at the tail of the field early on and chased along the inside, tipped two then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled in to take the inside route into upper stretch, improved position running on to secure the show honors while never threatening the top pair. STRAPPED hustled from the gate, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung six wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. OPPORTUNITY SET chased three to four wide until tucked to the two path through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired. BRAGGADOCIOUS chased three then two wide, retreated into the turn while just off the inside, continued to back away taking the two path into upper stretch and was eased home to the finish well behind.

ENTRY.NAME: Quality Chic
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, to ins 5/8, 4-5w upper, bid, rebuffed, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Braggadocious
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, retreated 7/16, 2p turn, 2w 1/4p, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Cloud Forest
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 3w 3/8, inside 1/4, ran on, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Opportunity Set
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w, coaxed 2p 3/8, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Black Rain
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 2p, ins turn, 3-4w upper, repelled foe, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Strapped
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 7/16, 6w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 81. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AGGELOS THE GREAT broke out then was hustled, chased the pace on the outside then in the three path on the turn, pursued the runner-up under a drive into the final sixteenth and got up late under strong handling. YO BANANA BOY went to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, vied in the two path on the turn, responded well when asked for his best in upper stretch, led until the final strides but was denied while clear for the place. QUIET WISDOM tossed his head at the start then bumped very hard with a rival, was well placed just off the pace, dropped from the two path to the rail while drafting behind the leader on the turn, was put to a drive in upper stretch, chased behind the top two to the finish and lacked the needed kick while well clear for the show. CATALINA CRUSH broke a half-step slow, settled under some urging, came under stronger encouragement in the four path on the turn and lacked the needed response. ALBEDO was coaxed along on the inside, lost action badly inside the half-mile pole then dropped back into the turn, saved ground through that bend and came up empty. SLAMMIN GOLD bumped very hard with a foe at the start then was taken up, spotted the front several lengths, was urged along at the rear, went five wide on the turn and was no factor. IN A MINUTE broke a step slow, settled off the pace, was urged three then two wide on the turn and capitulated.

ENTRY.NAME: Albedo
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed along inside,lost action badly ins1/2,drop back,ins,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Yo Banana Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: to front,pace,2p turn,led past 1/16,denied,clear for place

ENTRY.NAME: In a Minute
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow,settled,3-2path turn,capitulated

ENTRY.NAME: Slammin Gold
ENTRY.OWNER: Broman Sr Chester and Broman Mary
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd very hard brk,tkn up,urged,5wide turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Quiet Wisdom
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and St Elias Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: tossed head brk,bmpd hard,well placed,2p-ins turn,chsd,no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Catalina Crush
ENTRY.COMMENT: off 1/2 step slow,settled some urging,4w turn,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Aggelos the Great
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,hustled,chsd outside,3p turn,pursued leader,up late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 1 1/16M Turf CR: 88. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 85000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWEETIE tracked the pace along the inside, tipped to the two path placed to coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, tipped three wide at the three-sixteenths briefly nudging GOLDEN ROCKET, rallied to issue a challenge through the final furlong taking command at the sixteenth marker, then inched away to the finish to prevail. SPINNING COLORS three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, continued three wide into upper stretch, got nudged near the three-sixteenths by the aforementioned foe, dug in under a drive running on to secure the place honors. STELLA MARS established the front and showed the way in hand along the inside through sensible splits, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat and relented a sixteenth from home, kept on to preserve the show honors. GOLDEN ROCKET attended the leader to the outside in the two path, came under coaxing near the quarter pole when that rival attempted to slip away, cornered just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in head to head to the sixteenth marker challenging for command when overthrown by the eventual winner in tandem with her main pace foe, kept on to the finish. ORANGE FREEZE two to three wide in pursuit from the tail of the field, came under coaxing five-sixteenths from home, angled four wide into upper stretch, stayed on one paced through to the finish. COLLABORATION grew fractious and leapt straight up in the gate just as the latch was sprung bulling the assistant starter off his perch knocking him back over the side of the stall as he held tight to his charge out of necessity to protect both horse and the rider, who himself did a masterful job to stay in the saddle despite being briefly seated looking skyward, got away well behind once back on all fours and was escorted by outrider having lost all chance. Following a Stewards' Inquiry into the start, COLLABORATION was declared a non-starter prior to the race being declared official.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweetie
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, 2p 5/16, 2w 1/4, to 3p 3/16, up 1/16, inched away

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Hidden Lake Farm LLC & Fred Rosen

ENTRY.NAME: Stella Mars
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, coaxed near 1/4, ins 1/4, collared 1/16, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: attended 2p, coaxed near 1/4, 2w 1/4p, dug in, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Collaboration
ENTRY.COMMENT: leapt up start, declared non-starter

ENTRY.NAME: Spinning Colors
ENTRY.OWNER: Parsons, Jr., William and Howe, David S.
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed near 1/4, 3w upper, dug in, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Orange Freeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, angled 4w upper, one paced

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 37000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GUT FEELING stalked the pace on the outside, moved closer near the nine-sixteenths pole, was asked in the three path on the turn, made an outside bid in upper stretch, took the lead just inside the furlong marker, fought with the runner-up to the finish and narrowly prevailed under strong urging. MAMA'S GOLD showed speed on the outside then pressed the pace, took the lead in the two path outside the three-eighths, was asked for his best in upper stretch, lost the advantage just inside the furlong marker, fought on gamely to the finish but missed while able to get the place. GOOD RAPPORT brushed with a rival at the start, was well placed just off the pace, chased inside to the two path on the turn, pursued the leader into upper stretch, altered out behind horses nearing the furlong marker, pursued the top two to the finish and willingly earned the show. HAPPY BOB went to the front, showed the way under pressure to his outside, vied along the rail on the turn, lost the lead outside the three-eighths, dropped back nearing the quarter-pole, came off the rail in the stretch and weakened. STRONG LIGHT bobbled at the start then brushed with a foe, lagged at the rear, saved ground on the turn and was no factor. SCOTTO was hustled from the gate, fell well back while showing no speed, dropped from the six path to the four path on the turn, moved to the three path into the stretch and showed little. INSPECTOR was off a step slow, swerved in leaving the chute then angled to the rail, dropped back under a strong hand-ride leaving the backstretch, raced inside to the two path on the turn, spun four wide into the stretch and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Bob
ENTRY.OWNER: FIN Stables and Sal-Lou J G Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,inside turn,headed 3/8,drop back1/4,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Scotto
ENTRY.OWNER: Cipriano Vito Scotti Neil Alfleri Anthony and Bochilo Vincent
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,well back,6-4path turn,3path1/4,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled brk,brushed,well behind,inside turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Good Rapport
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd,well placed,ins-2path turn,altered out 1/8,chased,willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Mama's Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside,2p turn,lead out3/8,headed ins1/8,fought on,missd

ENTRY.NAME: Gut Feeling
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside,asked 3path turn,bid,lead ins1/8,fought foe,held

ENTRY.NAME: Inspector
ENTRY.OWNER: Ten Strike Racing Four Corners Racing Broadview Stables and Cory Moelis Racing L
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow,swerve in6-1/2,mvd in,ins-2p,4p1/4,faltered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 78. Maiden Special Weight Purse 70000. (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (For Horses That Sold Or RNA For $50,000 Or Less In Their Most Recent Sale).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHERE'S CHRIS four to five wide in aim of the front down the backstretch and through the far turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three wide into upper stretch, took over command at the three-sixteenths and drew clear under a drive to prevail. STUNNEM chased four paths off the inside down the backstretch before tucking inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued along the inside into upper stretch, ran on under a drive to get up for the place honors. SHORE TIME coaxed from the start, chased five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung three to four wide for home, ran on to secure the show honors. CHARLIE'S EXPRESS showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in and was collared at the three-sixteenths, then weakened in the late stages. MIKEALICIOUS broke in at the start bumping and squeezing back MUCHO DE LA MANCHA in tandem with DON VINO VICI, chased three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, tipped five wide into upper stretch and improved position to the wire. RUDY RUDY RUDY bobbled at the break, chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths and weakened in the stretch. DON VINO VICI broke out at the start squeezing back MUCHO DE LA MANCHA in concert with MIKEALICIOUS, chased along the inside under a ride from three furlongs out, swung three wide for home and offered no response. PICCATA PRINCE stumbled at the start, chased four then three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung five wide for home, made no impact. MIGHTY GLORY chased four to five wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch, made no impact. ALEAH ALEAH coaxed from the gate, raced four then three wide in aim of the front coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun two to three wide into upper stretch and faltered. MUCHO DE LA MANCHA got squeezed back between foes who each broke his way at the start conceding five to six lengths to the front, chased three to four wide down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing midway, cornered just off the inside into upper stretch and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Don Vino Vici
ENTRY.OWNER: Sal-Lou J G Stable Cotrone Robert and Carmine Cirrincione Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Rudy Rudy Rudy
ENTRY.OWNER: Scuderi Vincent S Imperio Michael Rodriguez Rudy R and Cotrone Robert
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Mighty Glory
ENTRY.OWNER: Sal-Lou J G Stable Rosenthal Robert D Rosenthal Peter and Greenberg Martin
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-5w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Mikealicious
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 3w, coaxed 3/8, angled 5w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Where's Chris
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-5w in aim, coaxed near 1/4, up 3/16, 3w upper, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Mucho de La Mancha
ENTRY.COMMENT: squeezed st, chased 3-4w, 2p turn, 2w 1/4p, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Charlie's Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, ins turn, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, collared 3/16, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Piccata Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Stunnem
ENTRY.OWNER: Bishop Chester A and Hinkson Anthony
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w backstretch, coaxed ins 3/8, ins 1/4, ran on, up for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Shore Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 5-6w backstretch, 2p turn, 3-4w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Aleah Aleah
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 4-3w in aim, coaxed near 1/4, 2-3w uppr, faltered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 6F Outer turf CR: 91. Allowance Purse 100000. OUTER TURF (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. No n-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DONTLOOKBACKATALL went to the front then moved clear, dictated terms in the two path through the turn, responded well when shaken up in upper stretch, was put to the crop inside the furlong marker and proved much the best under steady urging. PLAY THE MUSIC settled on the outside, was roused three wide on the turn, pursued the winner in the stretch and proved no match while just able to get the place. DEKANTER was well placed while rated just off the pace on the inside, saved ground while let out on the turn, chased the winner in the stretch and just missed the place while able to get the show. QUEEN OLLY (IRE) settled off the pace, saved ground on the turn, was asked near the five-sixteenths, moved out in upper stretch and lacked the needed kick. FEATHERS (IRE) settled at the rear, moved from the rail to the two path on the turn, came four wide into the stretch, shifted in inside the three-sixteenths and failed to rally. LADY MIA (FR) tracked the pace, tugged keenly on the bit under tight restraint near the nine-sixteenths, was let out in the two path on the turn, moved out in upper stretch and came up empty. GEORGEES SPIRIT moved out near the nine-sixteenths, settled on the outside, was asked while three then four wide on the turn and failed to threaten. FLEETFOOTED broke in at the start, was taken in hand early then reserved off the pace, went two then three wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response.

ENTRY.NAME: Dontlookbackatall
ENTRY.OWNER: West Point Thoroughbreds Scarlet Oak Racing and Titletown Racing Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear pace,2path turn,responded well,held,steady urging

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Mia (FR)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of CHY

ENTRY.OWNER: Madaket Stables LLC Rocco Steven and West Point Thoroughbreds
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace,keen 4-1/2,let out 2path turn,mvd out 3/16,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Queen Olly (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,inside turn,asked5/16,mvd out 3/16,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Dekanter
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Road Racing and Old Tavern Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed,rated,let out rail turn,chased,missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Georgees Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Abreu Jorge R Photos Finish LLC and Sportsmen Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved out 4-1/2,settled outside,3-4w turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Fleetfooted
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,in hand,reserved,2-3path turn,5w into lane,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Feathers (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: David A Bernsen LLC and Rockingham Ranch
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled at rear,ins-2p turn,4w into lane,mvd in,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Play the Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside,roused 3w turn,chased,no match,earned 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 45000. (UP TO $7,830 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROMAN GODDESS established the front near the six furlong marker and showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside into the turn and dueled with DASHING DELLA as that rival advanced outside to engage for the front, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch and edged clear under a drive to prevail. GHOSTLY GIRL chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch, ran on to secure the place honors. DASHING DELLA chased just off the pace four wide down the backstretch, advanced at the half mile pole and tucked to the two path into the turn getting on near even terms and knocking heads for command through the bend coming under coaxing nearing the quarter pole, swung three wide for home, dug in under a drive shaken off a furlong out, weakened in the late stages while safe for the show honors. HARLAN'S BOND six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked four then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, tipped six wide into upper stretch, kept on to the finish to secure the last major share. MY GIRL JAL chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, offered no response. SHIGEKO coaxed from the start, chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. DIVINE CROSS chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six to seven wide into upper stretch and weakened. SUSIE'S SAVER chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun three wide into upper stretch, made no impact. YOGI coaxed from the gate, flashed brief speed three wide down the backstretch, tucked to the two path into the turn and retreated under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Roman Goddess
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, dueled ins turn, coaxed 5/16, cut corner, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Yogi
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, forwardly placed 3p, 2p turn, 4-5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Shigeko
ENTRY.OWNER: Krakow Racing LLC and SOK Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased inside, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Susie's Saver
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, 3w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Dashing Della
ENTRY.OWNER: Arenas Marcelo Giangrande Salvatore and Giangrande Stefano
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace 4w, advanced 1/2, dueled 2p turn, 3w uppr, wknd lte

ENTRY.NAME: Ghostly Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: Toscano Jr John T Calia Richard and Salisbury Timothy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 4-5w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: My Girl Jal
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-4w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Divine Cross
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, coaxed 3w 3/8, 6-7w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Harlan's Bond
ENTRY.OWNER: Carney Sean Donk David G and Mackay Douglas R
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w backstretch, 4-3w turn, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 1 1/16M Turf CR: 95. Claiming Purse 45000. (UP TO $7,830 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $35,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUR COUNTRY was reserved in the back half of the field on the inside, rounded the far turn under a bit of extra left-rein guidance, was roused while swinging four wide into upper stretch, rallied outside into the final furlong and closed strongly to get up late and prevail. GHOSTLYPRINCE was well placed just off the pace in the two to three path, gained to make a bid into upper stretch, dueled with COVERT KAT into the final sixteenth, bested that rival for the place but was caught by the winner. COVERT KAT disputed the pace on the outside in the two path, was asked near the quarter-pole then came under a drive, dueled inside of the runner-up into the final sixteenth and was outfinished while clear for the show. KHAFRE was rated on the inside, moved to the two path late on the far turn, was asked near the three-sixteenths, chased under a drive into the final furlong and weakened. SPACE LAUNCH traveled around the opening bend in the two path, settled in the middle of the field, was roused four then five wide on the far turn and lacked the needed response. EDDIE THE GREAT was off slow and spotted the front several lengths, saved ground near the back, moved to the two path late on the far turn, angled out in upper stretch and failed to threaten. HE'S GOT IT went three wide on the first turn, settled towards the rear, was roused three wide on the far turn, came five wide into the stretch and failed to rally. SPETTRO was hustled from the gate, contested the pace on the inside, was asked early on the far turn, dropped back into upper stretch and tired. MY ROMEO LIMA stumbled at the start then was taken in hand early, went three wide on the first turn, was reserved towards the back, moved from the two path to the four path while asked on the far turn, came six wide into the stretch and was no factor. ARRIO went three to four wide on the first turn, moved up early on the backstretch, stalked the pace on the outside, chased three then four wide on the far turn and capitulated.

ENTRY.NAME: Ghostlyprince
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed 2-3path,ask1/4,bid3/16,dueled,missed,earned 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Khafre
ENTRY.OWNER: Lindy Farms MeB Racing Stables LLC and St Elias Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside,2path ins 5/16,asked3/16,chased,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Eddie the Great
ENTRY.OWNER: Chen Danny J Cestaro James and Campbell Road Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow,at rear,ins-2path turns,angled out 3/16,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Spettro
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,inside pace,asked 2nd turn,dropped back 3/16,tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 10 6F Outer turf CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. OUTER TURF FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUPERS LUCKY LADY got bumped at the start by VOLEUSE breaking outwards and then got bumped by SHAMAN PRINCESS coming inwards, pressed that rival along the inside early on before easing off to give chase through the turn coming under coaxing nearing the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch, tipped out to the two path near the eighth pole, rallied to steadily wear down the leader to get up in the final jumps and prevail. SHAMAN PRINCESS broke in at the start bumping the aforementioned foe, cut the pace just off the inside under some pressure early before being clear and safe through the turn, cut the corner into upper stretch, edged away under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in and was caught in the final strides to the finish. VOLEUSE broke out at the start bumping and carrying out a foe while squeezing back another, chased two to three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch and closed well to secure the show honors. LAURANA chased four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired. CERRETTA chased two to three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. SHE'S A NATURAL got taken in hand when squeezed out at the start conceding three to four lengths to the front, chased three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung three to four wide for home and was outkicked. SHOWEMYOURHEELS chased three then two wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, weakened. CHERBOURG chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, tired. TRUE MARTINI chased four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three wide into the turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired. ARMY OF THOUGHTS chased two to three wide until tucked inside near the seven-sixteenths, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Cerretta
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, angled 6w upper, mild kick
